projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

lg.l: dināntaramyo 'bhyupaśāntamanmatho nidāghakālo 'yamupāgataḥ priye //
maṇiprakārāḥ sarasaṃ ca candanaṃ śucau priye yānti janasya sevyatām //
sutantrigītaṃ madanasya dīpanaṃ śucau niśīthe 'nubhavanti kāminaḥ //
śiroruhaiḥ snānakaṣāyavāsitaiḥ striyo nidāghaṃ śamayanti kāminām //
pade pade haṃsarutānukāribhir janasya cittaṃ kriyate samanmatham //
nitambadeśāśca sahemamekhalāḥ prakurvate kasya mano na sotsukam //
staneṣu tanvaṃśukamunnatastanā niveśayanti pramadāḥ sayauvanāḥ //
savallakīkākaligītanisvanair vibodhyate supta ivādya manmathaḥ //
vilokya nūnaṃ bhṛśamutsukaściraṃ niśākṣaye yāti hriyeva pāṇḍutām //
na śakyate draṣṭumapi pravāsibhiḥ priyāviyogānaladagdhamānasaiḥ //
vanāntare toyamiti pradhāvitā nirīkṣya bhinnāñjanasaṃnibhaṃ nabhaḥ //
anaṅgasaṃdīpanamāśu kurvate yathā pradoṣāḥ śaśicārubhūṣaṇāḥ //
avāṅmukho jihmagatiḥ śvasanmuhuḥ phaṇī mayūrasya tale niṣīdati //
na hantyadūre 'pi gajānmṛgeśvaro vilolajihvaścalitāgrakesaraḥ //
pravṛddhatṛṣṇopahatā jalārthino na dantinaḥ kesariṇo 'pi bibhyati //
na bhoginaṃ ghnanti samīpavartinaṃ kalāpacakreṣu niveśitānanam //
ravermayūkhairabhitāpito bhṛśaṃ varāhayūtho viśatīva bhūtalam //
utplutya bhekastṛṣitasya bhoginaḥ phaṇātapatrasya tale niṣīdati //
parasparotpīḍanasaṃhatairgajaiḥ kṛtaṃ saraḥ sāndravimardakardamam //
viṣāgnisūryātapatāpitaḥ phaṇī na hanti maṇḍūkakulaṃ tṛṣākulaḥ //
tṛṣākulaṃ niḥsṛtamadrigahvarād avekṣamāṇaṃ mahiṣīkulaṃ jalam //
dinakaraparitāpakṣīṇatoyāḥ samantād vidadhati bhayamuccair vīkṣyamāṇā vanāntāḥ //
bhramati gavayayūthaḥ sarvatastoyamicchañ śarabhakulamajihmaṃ proddharatyambu kūpāt //
taṭaviṭapalatāgrāliṅganavyākulena diśi diśi paridagdhā bhūmayaḥ pāvakena //
prasarati tṛṇamadhye labdhavṛddhiḥ kṣaṇena glapayati mṛgavargaṃ prāntalagno davāgniḥ //
pariṇatadalaśākhānutpatanprāṃśuvṛkṣān bhramati pavanadhūtaḥ sarvato 'gnirvanānte //
hutavahaparikhedād āśu nirgatya kakṣād vipulapulinadeśāṃ nimnagāṃ saṃviśanti //
vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe sukhena //
samāgato rājavad uddhatadyutir ghanāgamaḥ kāmijanapriyaḥ priye //
kvacitsagarbhapramadāstanaprabhaiḥ samācitaṃ vyoma ghanaiḥ samantataḥ //
prayānti mandaṃ bahudhāravarṣiṇo balāhakāḥ śrotramanoharasvanāḥ //
sutīkṣṇadhārāpatanograsāyakais tudanti cetaḥ prasabhaṃ pravāsinām //
vibhāti śukletararatnabhūṣitā varāṅganeva kṣitirindragopakaiḥ //
sasaṃbhramāliṅganacumbanākulaṃ pravṛttanṛtyaṃ kulamadya barhiṇām //
striyaḥ suduṣṭā iva jātivibhramāḥ prayānti nadyastvaritaṃ payonidhim //
vanāni vaindhyāni haranti mānasaṃ vibhūṣitānyudgatapallavair drumaiḥ //
samācitā saikatinī vanasthalī samutsukatvaṃ prakaroti cetasaḥ //
taḍitprabhādarśitamārgabhūmayaḥ prayānti rāgādabhisārikāḥ striyaḥ //
kṛtāparādhānapi yoṣitaḥ priyān pariṣvajante śayane nirantaram //
nirastamālyābharaṇānulepanāḥ sthitā nirāśāḥ pramadāḥ pravāsinām //
sasādhvasairbhekakulair nirīkṣitaṃ prayāti nimnābhimukhaṃ navodakam //
patanti mūḍhāḥ śikhināṃ pranṛtyatāṃ kalāpacakreṣu navotpalāśayā //
kapoladeśā vimalotpalaprabhāḥ sabhṛṅgayūthair madavāribhiś citāḥ //
pravṛttanṛtyaiḥ śikhibhiḥ samākulāḥ samutsukatvaṃ janayanti bhūdharāḥ //
sasīkarāmbhodharasaṅgaśītalaḥ samīraṇaḥ kaṃ na karoti sotsukam //
stanaiḥ sahārairvadanaiḥ sasīdhubhiḥ striyo ratiṃ saṃjanayanti kāminām //
nadyo ghanā mattagajā vanāntāḥ priyāvihīnāḥ śikhinaḥ plavaṃgāḥ //
striyaśca kāñcīmaṇikuṇḍalojjvalā haranti ceto yugapatpravāsinām //
karṇāntareṣu kakubhadrumamañjarībhir icchānukūlaracitān avataṃsakāṃśca //
śrutvā dhvaniṃ jalamucāṃ tvaritaṃ pradoṣe śayyāgṛhaṃ gurugṛhātpraviśanti nāryaḥ //
apahṛtamiva cetastoyadaiḥ sendracāpaiḥ pathikajanavadhūnāṃ tadviyogākulānām //
hasitamiva vidhatte sūcibhiḥ ketakīnāṃ navasalilaniṣekacchinnatāpo vanāntaḥ //
vikacanavakadambaiḥ karṇapūraṃ vadhūnāṃ racayati jaladaughaḥ kāntavatkāla eṣaḥ //
navajalakaṇasekādudgatāṃ romarājīṃ lalitavalivibhaṅgairmadhyadeśaiśca nāryaḥ //
janitaruciragandhaḥ ketakīnāṃ rajobhiḥ pariharati nabhasvān proṣitānāṃ manāṃsi //
atiśayaparuṣābhir grīṣmavahneḥ śikhābhiḥ samupajanitatāpaṃ hlādayantīva vindhyam //
jaladasamaya eṣa prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūto diśatu tava hitāni prāyaśo vāñchitāni //
āpakvaśālirucirānatagātrayaṣṭiḥ prāptā śarannavavadhūriva rūparamyā //
saptacchadaiḥ kusumabhāranatairvanāntāḥ śuklīkṛtānyupavanāni ca mālatībhiḥ //
nadyo viśālapulināntanitambabimbā mandaṃ prayānti samadāḥ pramadā ivādya //
saṃlakṣyate pavanavegacalaiḥ payodai rājeva cāmaraśatair upavījyamānaḥ //
vaprāśca pakvakalamāvṛtabhūmibhāgāḥ protkaṇṭhayanti na mano bhuvi kasya yūnaḥ //
mattadvirephaparipītamadhuprasekaś cittaṃ vidārayati kasya na kovidāraḥ //
jyotsnādukūlamamalaṃ rajanī dadhānā vṛddhiṃ prayātyanudinaṃ pramadeva bālā //
kurvanti haṃsavirutaiḥ parito janasya prītiṃ saroruharajo 'ruṇitās taṭinyaḥ //
patyurviyogaviṣadagdhaśarakṣatānāṃ candro dahatyatitarāṃ tanumaṅganānām //
utphullapaṅkajavanāṃ nalinīṃ vidhunvan nyūnāṃ manaścalayati prasabhaṃ nabhasvān //
mandaprabhātapavanodgatavīcimālāny utkaṇṭhayanti sahasā hṛdayaṃ sarāṃsi //
dhunvanti pakṣapavanairna nabho balākāḥ paśyanti nonnatamukhā gaganaṃ mayūrāḥ //
muktvā kadambakuṭajārjunasarjanīpān saptacchadānupagatā kusumodgamaśrīḥ //
paryantasaṃsthitamṛgīnayanotpalāni protkaṇṭhayantyupavanāni manāṃsi puṃsām //
utkaṇṭhayatyatitarāṃ pavanaḥ prabhāte pattrāntalagnatuhināmbuvidhūyamānaḥ //
haṃsaiḥ sasārasakulaiḥ pratināditāni sīmāntarāṇi janayanti nṛṇāṃ pramodam //
nīlotpalairmadakalāni vilocanāni bhrūvibhramāśca rucirās tanubhis taraṃgaiḥ //
dantāvabhāsaviśadasmitacandrakāntiṃ kaṅkelipuṣparucirā navamālatī ca //
karṇeṣu ca pravarakāñcanakuṇḍaleṣu nīlotpalāni vividhāni niveśayanti //
pādāmbujāni kalanūpuraśekharaiśca nāryaḥ prahṛṣṭamanaso 'dya vibhūṣayanti //
śriyamatiśayarūpāṃ vyoma toyāśayānāṃ vahati vigatameghaṃ candratārāvakīrṇam //
vigatakaluṣamambhaḥ śyānapaṅkā dharitrī vimalakiraṇacandraṃ vyoma tārāvicitram //
racitakusumagandhi prāyaśo yānti veśma prabalamadanahetostyaktasaṃgītarāgāḥ //
anupamamukharāgā rātrimadhye vinodaṃ śaradi taruṇakāntāḥ sūcayanti pramodān //
kumudamapi gate 'staṃ līyate candrabimbe hasitamiva vadhūnāṃ proṣiteṣu priyeṣu //
adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ pathikajana idānīṃ roditi bhrāntacittaḥ //
bandhūkakāntimadhareṣu manohareṣu kvāpi prayāti subhagā śaradāgamaśrīḥ //
kumudarucirakāntiḥ kāminīvonmadeyaṃ pratidiśatu śaradvaścetasaḥ prītimagryām //
vilīnapadmaḥ prapatattuṣāro hemantakālaḥ samupāgato 'yam //
vilāsinīnāṃ stanaśālinīnāṃ nālaṃkriyante stanamaṇḍalāni //
nitambabimbeṣu navaṃ dukūlaṃ tanvaṃśukaṃ pīnapayodhareṣu //
na nūpurairhaṃsarutaṃ bhajadbhiḥ pādāmbujāny ambujakāntibhāñji //
śirāṃsi kālāgurudhūpitāni kurvanti nāryaḥ suratotsavāya //
hasanti noccair daśanāgrabhinnān prapīḍyamānān adharān avekṣya //
tṛṇāgralagnaistuhinaiḥ patadbhir ākrandatīvoṣasi śītakālaḥ //
manoharakrauñcanināditāni sīmāntarāṇy utsukayanti cetaḥ //
prasannatoyāni suśītalāni sarāṃsi cetāṃsi haranti puṃsām //
avekṣyamāṇā hariṇekṣaṇākṣyaḥ prabodhayantīva manorathāni //
priye priyaṅguḥ priyaviprayuktā vipāṇḍutāṃ yāti vilāsinīva //
parasparāṅgavyatiṣaṅgaśāyī śete janaḥ kāmarasānuviddhaḥ //
saṃsūcyate nirdayamaṅganānāṃ ratopabhogo navayauvanānām //
dantacchadaṃ priyatamena nipītasāraṃ dantāgrabhinnam avakṛṣya nirīkṣate ca //
srastāṃsadeśalalitākulakeśapāśā nidrāṃ prayāti mṛdusūryakarābhitaptā //
pīnonnatastanabharānatagātrayaṣṭyaḥ kurvanti keśaracanāmaparāstaruṇyaḥ //
kūrpāsakaṃ paridadhāti nakhakṣatāṅgī vyālambinīlalalitālakakuñcitākṣī //
saṃhṛṣyamāṇapulakorupayodharāntā abhyañjanaṃ vidadhati pramadāḥ suśobhāḥ //
vinipatitatuṣāraḥ krauñcanādopagītaḥ pradiśatu himayuktaḥ kāla eṣaḥ sukhaṃ vaḥ //
prakāmakāmaṃ pramadājanapriyaṃ varoru kālaṃ śiśirāhvayaṃ śṛṇu //
gurūṇi vāsāṃsyabalāḥ sayauvanāḥ prayānti kāle 'tra janasya sevyatām //
na vāyavaḥ sāndratuṣāraśītalā janasya cittaṃ ramayanti sāmpratam //
vipāṇḍutārāgaṇacārubhūṣaṇā janasya sevyā na bhavanti rātrayaḥ //
prakāmakālāgurudhūpavāsitaṃ viśanti śayyāgṛhamutsukāḥ striyaḥ //
nirīkṣya bhartṝn suratābhilāṣiṇaḥ striyo 'parādhānsamadā visasmaruḥ //
bhramanti mandaṃ śramakheditoravaḥ kṣapāvasāne navayauvanāḥ striyaḥ //
niveśitāntaḥ kusumaiḥ śiroruhair vibhūṣayantīva himāgamaṃ striyaḥ //
vilāsinībhiḥ paripīḍitorasaḥ svapanti śītaṃ paribhūya kāminaḥ //
niśāsu hṛṣṭā saha kāmibhiḥ striyaḥ pibanti madyaṃ madanīyamuttamam //
priyatamaparibhuktaṃ vīkṣamāṇā svadehaṃ vrajati śayanavāsādvāsamanyaṃ hasantī //
tyajati gurunitambā nimnanābhiḥ sumadhyā uṣasi śayanamanyā kāminī cāruśobhām //
uṣasi vadanabimbairaṃsasaṃsaktakeśaiḥ śriya iva gṛhamadhye saṃsthitā yoṣito 'dya //
suratasamayaveṣaṃ naiśamāśu prahāya dadhati divasayogyaṃ veśamanyāstaruṇyaḥ //
abhimatarataveṣaṃ nandayantyastaruṇyaḥ saviturudayakāle bhūṣayantyānanāni //
priyajanarahitānāṃ citasaṃtāpahetuḥ śiśirasamaya eṣa śreyase vo 'stu nityam //
manāṃsi bhettuṃ surataprasaṅgināṃ vasantayoddhā samupāgataḥ priye //
sukhāḥ pradoṣā divasāśca ramyāḥ sarvaṃ priye cārutaraṃ vasante //
kurvanti nāryo 'pi vasantakāle stanaṃ sahāraṃ kusumairmanoharaiḥ //
cūtadrumāṇāṃ kusumānvitānāṃ dadāti saubhāgyamayaṃ vasantaḥ //
tanvaṃśukaiḥ kuṅkumarāgagaurair alaṃkriyante stanamaṇḍalāni //
puṣpaṃ ca phullaṃ navamallikāyāḥ prayānti kāntiṃ pramadājanānām //
prayāntyanaṅgāturamānasānāṃ nitambinīnāṃ jaghaneṣu kāñcyaḥ //
ratnāntare mauktikasaṅgaramyaḥ svedāgamo vistaratāmupaiti //
samīpavartiṣvadhunā priyeṣu samutsukā eva bhavanti nāryaḥ //
aṅgānyanaṅgaḥ pramadājanasya karoti lāvaṇyasasaṃbhramāṇi //
harmyaṃ prayāti śayituṃ sukhaśītalaṃ ca kāntāṃ ca gāḍhamupagūhati śītalatvāt //
madhyeṣu nimno jaghaneṣu pīnaḥ strīṇāmanaṅgo bahudhā sthito 'dya //
bhrūkṣepajihmāni ca vīkṣitāni cakāra kāmaḥ pramadājanānām //
ālipyate candanam aṅganābhir madālasābhir mṛganābhiyuktam //
sugandhikālāgurudhūpitāni dhatte janaḥ kāmamadālasāṅgaḥ //
kūjaddvirephāpyayam ambujasthaḥ priyaṃ priyāyāḥ prakaroti cāṭu //
kurvanti kāmaṃ pavanāvadhūtāḥ paryutsukaṃ mānasamaṅganānām //
kurvantyaśokā hṛdayaṃ saśokaṃ nirīkṣyamāṇā navayauvanānām //
kurvanti kāmimanasāṃ sahasotsukatvaṃ bālātimuktalatikāḥ samavekṣyamāṇāḥ //
dṛṣṭvā priye sahṛdayasya bhavenna kasya kandarpabāṇapatanavyathitaṃ hi cetaḥ //
sadyo vasantasamayena samāciteyaṃ raktāṃśukā navavadhūriva bhāti bhūmiḥ //
yatkokilaḥ punarayaṃ madhurairvacobhir yūnāṃ manaḥ suvadanānihitaṃ nihanti //
lajjānvitaṃ savinayaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṣaṇena paryākulaṃ kulagṛhe 'pi kṛtaṃ vadhūnām //
vāyur vivāti hṛdayāni harannarāṇāṃ nīhārapātavigamātsubhago vasante //
cittaṃ munerapi haranti nivṛttarāgaṃ prāgeva rāgamalināni manāṃsi yūnām //
māse madhau madhurakokilabhṛṅganādair nāryā haranti hṛdayaṃ prasabhaṃ narāṇām //
śaileyajālapariṇaddhaśilātalāntān dṛṣṭvā janaḥ kṣitibhṛto mudameti sarvaḥ //
kāntāviyogaparikheditacittavṛttir dṛṣṭvādhvagaḥ kusumitānsahakāravṛkṣān //
iṣubhiriva sutīkṣṇairmānasaṃ māninīnāṃ tudati kusumamāso manmathoddīpanāya //
abhimukhamabhivīkṣya kṣāmadeho 'pi mārge madanaśaranighātair mohameti pravāsī //
karakisalayakāntiṃ pallavairvidrumābhair upahasati vasantaḥ kāminīnāmidānīm //
madajanitavilāsair dṛṣṭipātair munīndrān stanabharanatanāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān //
gurutarakucayugmaṃ śroṇibimbaṃ tathaiva na bhavati kimidānīṃ yoṣitāṃ manmathāya //
utkūjitaiḥ parabhṛtasya madākulasya śrotrapriyairmadhukarasya ca gītanādaiḥ //
mattāliyūthavirutaṃ niśi sīdhupānaṃ sarvaṃ rasāyanamidaṃ kusumāyudhasya //
cūtāmodasugandhimandapavanaḥ śṛṅgāradīkṣāguruḥ kalpāntaṃ madanapriyo diśatu vaḥ puṣpāgamo maṅgalam //
vividhamadhupayūthair veṣṭyamānaḥ samantād bhavatu tava vasantaḥ śreṣṭhakālaḥ sukhāya //
